goal.ch: 使學生具有解決較大型問題和複雜問題的程式設計能力
goal.en: The tranning is supposed to enable the students  to solve larger and more complex problems.

outline.ch:
本課程介紹相關的程式設計技術，透過這些學習使學生具有解決較大型問題和複雜問題的能力。
課程內容包括以下部分：
-Introduction
-Searching
-Linked lists
-Stacks
-Queues
-Recursion
-Introduction to Trees
-Searching Trees
-Heaps
-Multiway Trees
-Advanced Sorting Concepts
-Graph
outline.en:
The course introduces a wide range of programming techniques that make it possible to solve larger and more complex problems. The contents include
-Introduction
-Searching
-Linked lists
-Stacks
-Queues
-Recursion
-Introduction to Trees
-Searching Trees
-Heaps
-Multiway Trees
-Advanced Sorting Concepts
-Graph

textbook.ch:
參考書
1. Richard Gilberg, Behrouz Forouzan, “Data Structures: A Pseudocode Approach with C++ ”, BrooksCole
2. 張真誠, 蔡文輝, 胡育誠, “資料結構導論C語言實作Introduction to Data Structures and Their Applications by C language”, 全華
3. E. Horowitz, S. Sahni, S. Anderson-freed, “Fundamentals of Data Structures in C ”, 1993, W.H. freeman and Company
textbook.en:
References
1. Richard Gilberg, Behrouz Forouzan, “Data Structures: A Pseudocode Approach with C++ ”, BrooksCole
2. 張真誠, 蔡文輝, 胡育誠, “資料結構導論C語言實作Introduction to Data Structures and Their Applications by C language”, 全華
3. E. Horowitz, S. Sahni, S. Anderson-freed, “Fundamentals of Data Structures in C ”, 1993, W.H. freeman and Company

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch:
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
平時成績 30% (含平時測驗、作業、上課參與)
註：若因疫情無法舉行實體考試，期中與期末考可能改採其他評量方式取代，其配分比重亦會視情況調整。
gradMethod.en:
midterm exam. 30%
final exam. 40%
general mark 30%

flexDiscription.ch: 學期作業實作/輔助學習
flexDiscription.en: 學期作業實作/輔助學習

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
